sentences.en: Auntie and Uncle suggested she serve in the shop.
sentences.cn: 阿姨和叔叔建议她去商店工作。

sentences.en: He had an urge to open a shop of his own.
sentences.cn: 他很想自己开一家店。

sentences.en: he set up shop as a hairdresser in Soho.
sentences.cn: 他在梭霍区开了一家理发店。

sentences.en: He set up shop as an independent PR consultant.
sentences.cn: 他自己开公司，做起了独立公共关系顾问。

sentences.en: His shop is open Monday through Friday, 9am to 6pm.
sentences.cn: 他的店周一到周五、每天上午9点到下午6点对外营业。

sentences.en: I paid a visit to my local print shop.
sentences.cn: 我去了我们当地的照片冲洗店.

sentences.en: I’m just going down to the shops .
sentences.cn: 我正要去商店。

sentences.en: It's a new shop selling discounted lines and seconds.
sentences.cn: 这是家新开的商店，出售打折商品和等外品。

sentences.en: Mum’s out shopping with Granny.
sentences.cn: 妈妈和奶奶去购物了。

sentences.en: She always does the weekly shop on a Friday.
sentences.cn: 她总是在星期五进行每周一次的采购。

sentences.en: Shirley saw her reflection in the shop window.
sentences.cn: 雪莉在商店橱窗里看到了自己的影像。

sentences.en: Sock Shop was one of the high-street success stories of the 80s.
sentences.cn: “袜铺”是20世纪80年代商业成功的范例之一。

sentences.en: the local shops
sentences.cn: 当地的商店

sentences.en: The news from Body Shop rattled the rest of the retail sector.
sentences.cn: 从“美体小铺”传来的消息令整个零售行业不安。

sentences.en: The next day, Saturday, we went shopping.
sentences.cn: 第二天是星期六，我们去逛商店了。

sentences.en: The shop assistant received me indifferently while leaning on a counter.
sentences.cn: 商店售货员靠在柜台上漫不经心地招呼我。

sentences.en: The shop imports goods such as painted gourd containers.
sentences.cn: 这家商店进口诸如彩绘葫芦容器等商品。

sentences.en: The shop is devoted to a new range of accessories.
sentences.cn: 该商店专营新的一系列配件。

sentences.en: The shop stocks everything from cigarettes to recycled loo paper.
sentences.cn: 商店货品齐全，从香烟到再生厕纸应有尽有。

sentences.en: The victim was outside a shop when he was attacked.
sentences.cn: 被害人遇袭时正在一家商店的外面。

sentences.en: They trekked from shop to shop in search of white knee-length socks.
sentences.cn: 他们拖着步子从一家商店走到另一家，寻找齐膝的白袜子。

sentences.en: This Islington shop is a treasure trove of beautiful bridalwear.
sentences.cn: 这家位于伊斯灵顿区的商店里汇聚了各种漂亮的新娘服装。
